alert.note: Alert for Mifflin; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Snyder; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MIFFLIN... SOUTHEASTERN CENTRE...NORTHWESTERN SNYDER...SOUTHWESTERN UNION AND SOUTH CENTRAL CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Lock Haven, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Lamar, Mill Hall, McClure, Millheim, Blanchard, Aaronsburg, Rebersburg, Coburn, Troxelville, Madisonburg, Monument, Weikert, Bald Eagle State Park, Snyder-Middleswart State Park, Mackeyville, Laurelton Center, Poe Valley State Park, Howard and Beech Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Mifflin; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Snyder; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Union
